actions.name: DescribeServices
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve service details for all (paginated) services (if serviceCode is not set) or service detail for a particular service (if given serviceCode)

actions.name: GetAttributeValues
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all (paginated) possible values for a given attribute

actions.name: GetProducts
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all matching products with given search criteria
